General.Name: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Reinsurance Public Company Limited provides non-life reinsurance products and services in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Conventional Products and Non-Conventional Products. It offers reinsurance products, including motor, property, fire, industrial all risk, marine hull and cargo, liability, financial, personal accident, health, etc. The company also provides computer services in relation to motor insurance claim management; claim management and marketing services; and actuarial, training, and advisory services, as well as technical consultation and professional risk pool management services. In addition, it develops platforms and applications for non-life insurance companies, life insurance companies, and other companies, as well as electronic commerce services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
